title: Dibrugarh University International Literature Festival 2025
description: Last week, I got to chair my dream literary festival event panel. title: Book of the month: Baqytgul Sarmekova
description: I love small presses. They are the heroes of the international-literature world, taking risks and bringing into Englishes stories that would never win the backing of the more conservative and commercially driven big houses. Tilted Axis Press is one of several that I particularly admire. The essay collection Violent Phenomena that it published in 2022, […]
